title: Matzi M端ller
text:
The first time I have heard of a radio animation of trusted Housesitters.
The idea I found good and so began my search on the net.
In the meantime we have already found two really amiable and responsible people for our dogs twice on TrustedHousesitters .... A very good and easy to use tool to bring people together who have a common idea ....Thanks for this platform, where you can find people, who want to share this idea....
